p: Recently, the analysis of gland-derived expressed sequence tags followed by quantitative polymerase chain reaction analysis showed that almost all candidate genes of the cannabinoid pathway are preferentially expressed in glandular trichomes [ 19]. The determination of the essential oil composition so far has been performed by GC/MS [ 20], LC/MS [ 21, 22] or NMR analysis [ 22], or the concentration of THCA was estimated by fluoroimmunoassays of Cannabis extracts [ 23]. Due to the destructive nature of these techniques and the large amount of glands needed, information on single trichomes or spatial localisation of the metabolites within a trichome are lost.
